item.title: Man struck and killed on freeway after fleeing immigration agents, official says
item.description: A Department of Homeland Security spokesperson says the man was not being pursued by immigration agents.

item.title: Alaska Summit: There’s no deal until there’s a deal
item.description: President Donald Trump says there's no deal until there's a deal, after meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin concerning a possible ceasefire for Ukraine.

item.title: Video shows police detaining suspected drunken Southwest pilot attempting to board plane
item.description: Earlier this year, the Federal Aviation Administration revoked the certification of a pilot charged with DUI at a Georgia airport.

item.title: Manatee County Commissioners still up in the air on a possible boat ramp on Cortez
item.description: County Commissioner Tal Siddique said there has been talk from the community and the board to create a waterfront dining or lease out portions of the land.

item.title: Farmer’s Markets Saturday Forecast
item.description: Morning is better at the Farmers Market, mainly because of the heat and humidity

item.title: Lost ID found on island 20 years later reconnects woman with life before Hurricane Katrina
item.description: A wildlife biologist spotted a lost high school identification card in the sand dating back nearly two decades.

item.title: Crews clean up overnight sewer spill
item.description: estimated 11,000 gallons of untreated domestic sewage were discharged

item.title: Two suspects enter plea deals in Punta Gorda murder-for-hire case
item.description: Both received sentences of over 10 years in prison for criminal conspiracy to commit murder.

item.title: Storms, sizzle, and Hurricane Erin’s shadow. Your Suncoast forecast
item.description: Sizzling heat continues as we watch Erin's every move.

item.title: Hurricane Erin explodes to Cat 5 strength: What it means for Florida
item.description: This monster CAT 5 hurricane already making records.
